document_data.name: Bwimb II
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bwimb II''', called the '''Paraelemental Princess of Ooze''', was the second evil [[archomental]] of the [[Paraelemental Plane of Ooze]] after the death of her father, [[Bwimb]]. Although she was generally considered a true archomental (in the loosest sense), she was the weakest of the group.
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description:
Bwimb II was an undulating mass of violet sludge.
<!--==Personality==
document_data.Activities: According to rumor, Bwimb II knew that she would never be more than a minor archomental on her own and had begun searching outside of her homeplane for allies.

Relationships.Enemies: Like her father, Bwimb II was an enemy of [[Ben-hadar]] because of how she polluted pure waters.<ref>{{Cite dragon/353/Princes of Elemental Good|45}}
Relationships.Allies: Bwimb II had somehow come to an understanding with the demon lord [[Juiblex]], though what their shared goals might be was unclear.
Relationships.Servitors: The [[ooze para-elemental]]s obeyed her, but little else that inhabited the Para-Elemental Plane of Ooze paid any attention to her.

document_data.History: Bwimb II inherited her power and title as archomental of Ooze after the death of her father, Bwimb, at the hands of [[Tenebrous]].<ref>
document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to some rather morbid gossip, Bwimb II had spawned from the sludge-like corpse of her "father".
